content: Hello Mister Heine, my name is James Smith from the United States of America. Thanks for inviting me to see the apartment in Munich. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: James Smith from the United States of America

content: Hello James, thank you for your interest in the apartment. I am looking for a reliable and responsible tenant who will pay a fair price for the rental. What is your budget for a 25 square meter apartment in Munich?
name: Heinrich Heine

content: My budget is 700 euros per month. I would like to negotiate with you on the rental price. Can you suggest a price?
name: James Smith from the United States of America

content: Certainly, James. Based on the current market rates in Munich, I would suggest a rental price of 800 euros per month. This would take into account the location and the condition of the apartment, as well as the utilities and other expenses that come with living in Munich.
name: Heinrich Heine

content: That sounds fair. I agree to the price of 800 euros per month. Thank you for your understanding.
name: James Smith from the United States of America

content: You're welcome, James. I'm glad we could come to an agreement on the rental price. Let's move forward with the lease agreement and get this sorted out.
name: Heinrich Heine
